name: arch::device::serial::SerialPort::new

io::io_port::IoPort::<T, A>::new.doc:
Creates an I/O port.

 # Safety

 Reading from or writing to the I/O port may have side effects. Those side effects must not
 cause soundness problems (e.g., they must not corrupt the kernel memory).

doc:
Creates a serial port.

 # Safety

 The caller must ensure that the base port is a valid serial base port and that it has
 exclusive ownership of the serial ports.
